participant_abstract.sent: There were many good suggestions, but probably too many to incorporate in the product within the budget at the suggested selling price.
We have to limit what we can do.

participant_actions.sent: Manager reflect on everyone's input User interface reflect on realistic goals Industrial design - feasibility Marketing -- user requirements and sizzle to sell.

participant_decisions.sent: Product must have new features striking design attractive size and shape

participant_problems.sent: Too many features suggested* Some unrealistic suggestions* More input needed from industrial design person.
